summary:
⚀ Gained outstanding knowledge on complex problem solving by the techno-managerial approach, advanced tools used for food quality management, food safety, quality and safety standards, food fraud and authenticity, and food law.

⚀  5 years experience in food product development and research and quality enhancement.  

⚁ Expert product quality testing, blending of products, developing new products.
 
⚃ Strong project management and team leadership skills used to organize and execute projects in a manufacturing environment.

⚄ I am interested in quality assurance manager /specialist/engineer, quality control engineer, application technologist, and other similar roles within food companies. 

I will bring a collaborative, problem-solving spirit, and a drive to succeed to the company as well as the dedication to see assignments to completion. 

If you are open, let´s connect at  ✉ divyapanwar1987@gmail.com

profile_positions.description:
Topic: Analyzing the factors influencing the effectiveness of control measures during the supply chain of cereals. 
This project is aimed at identifying the key risk factors that encourage the growth of mycotoxins in the feed supply chain and also compromise the effectiveness of control measures applied during different stages of the feed supply chain to control the growth of mycotoxins. Thereby, improving the risk-based supplier control system.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:
Accomplishments

►Ensuring the accuracy of customs clearance papers, on-time delivery schedule, and on-time submission of customs clearance papers to authority.
►Following customs clearance process strictly and booking units by different processes on SAP.
►Experience with working with Track on Trade, FoxPro database, and distribution concepts and systems.
profile_positions.title: Customs Employee

profile_positions.description:
'Uttarakhand Tea Development Board' is a State Government organization that produces black orthodox and green tea.  Being located in a central Himalayan region, its unique climate is quite suitable for the production of the finest quality of tea in terms of both flavor and productivity.

During my tenure as a "Tea Processing Expert", I was responsible for auditing the tea production process, green leaves harvesting in tea gardens, inspection and purchase of factory equipment, and tea quality analysis of four factories.   I managed a team of factory managers, field supervisors, and office staff to accomplish different tasks within the stipulated time to improve and increase productivity. 

Accomplishments

►Spearheaded the branding and launching of the Uttarakhand tea logo for promoting its tea products as well as in obtaining a tea export license. 

►Managed a strict budget to acquire a teabag packaging machine based on our packaging requirements in order to commercialize our tea products. 

►Developed an online daily production reporting system in which production input values provided by factories managers on daily basis were recorded to obtain consistency in the quality of tea.

► Collaborated with Advocates and Central Tea Board of India to certify Uttarakhand tea with HACCP certification in order to win the trust of our potential customers.  Our efforts resulted in the application for this certification and a 50% subsidy amount released by the Government of India.

Acquired skills: 
★ HACCP ★ FSSAI★ Trustea ★ Audit ★ Biochemical & Sensory analysis ★ Product development  ★ Tea tasting ★ Presentation ★ R&D ★ Fermentation ★ Withering ★ Drying ★  Grading ★ Production Management ★ Packaging ★ GMP ★ Quality control
profile_positions.title: Tea Processing Expert

profile_positions.description:
Nagaland University is a Central University established in the state of Nagaland by an Act of Parliament by the Government of India in 1989.  Department of Agricultural Engineering and Technology is actively involved in providing scientific knowledge to increase agricultural production and productivity and designing improved methods of processing/ preservation of foods.

Accomplishments
►Demonstrated excellent public speaking and presenting skills through the delivery of food science lectures to groups of more than 30 students.

►Successfully arranged summer training programs for engineering students in recognized institutions of food technology.

►Conducted laboratory scale research, organized industrial visits, sports, and cultural fests. 

Acquired Skills:
★ Public speaking  ★ Time-management ★ Inter-personal communication ★ Record-keeping ★ Networking
profile_positions.title: Food Engineering Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kharagpur is one of the leading academic institutions for science, engineering, and technology in India, and possibly, in the world.

Accomplishments

►Collaborated with scientists, engineers, and students in a research project " standardization of process parameters in withering, maceration, rolling, fermentation, and drying of tea". I was selected to work on the specialized topic to 'standardize the withering process parameters of Tea'.

► Developed a customized withering trough which attains uniformity, reduces the power 
 consumption and process time without affecting tea’s antioxidant and other biochemical and rheological properties.

► Investigated the changes in moisture content, peroxidase and polyphenol oxidase specific activity, protein, amino acid, and chlorophyll content during withering in the customized trough and compared the results with natural withering data.  After a thorough investigation, I published the results of the work in a peer reviewed journal. 

My research work was appreciated and the customized withering trough was later purchased by a tea company in Darjeeling tea estates.

Acquired skills: 
★ UV Spectrophotometer   ★ High-performance liquid chromatography
★ Gas Chromatography ★ Centrifuge ★ Electronic Nose ★ Scientific Research ★ Biochemical Analysis ★ Electronic Vision  ★ Fermentation Unit  ★ Graders/Sorters                 
★ Tea Processing Machines (withering trough, single cut tea maceration machine, screw-type rolling device, flat belt tea roller, roto cone tea roller, radiofrequency dryer, vacuum dryer, googhi machine, Arnott grader)
profile_positions.title: Senior Research Fellow
